column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////First time in Chicago
column2: so I had to try deep dish pizza. Definitely a one time thing for me. The wait for the pizza to come out was about 30+ minutes
column4: this is not the place to go. That's the usual time
column5: though! Pizza wasn't even hot when it came out. We got the Lou Malnati's Special and it was okay. Way too much sausage
column6: so we got tired of it quick. The appearance wasn't even that nice for the gram. Probably won't be back
column7: but it was cool to try!
